column4: Hey I was updating a computer with ubuntu 8.10 to 9.04, and my sister had to use it, and after she got back on I used it, noticed volume was screwy, asked if she closed out the updator, and she said it closed itself out so I rebooted the PC
Is there anything I can do to recover the data or repair my installation?
first of all. go kick your sister in the knee :P
